#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
long long int t,n,s,e,x,y,count,n_temp;
scanf("%lld",&t);
while(t--)
{
    count=0;
scanf("%lld %lld",&s,&e);
scanf("%lld",&n);
n_temp = n;
while(n_temp--)
{
	
	scanf("%lld %lld",&x,&y);
    if((x<=s&&y<=s)||(x>=e&&y>=e))
		count++;

}
    
	if(count == n)
    printf("YES\n");
	else
	printf("NO\n");

}
return 0;
}
